channel.title: Projects on Randy Griffin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Randy Griffin

item.title: Project 1: Patient Wait Times
item.description: Analyzed customer wait times using Excel and developed a report to identify the cause of long wait times. Link to Powerpoint

item.title: Project 2: Hotel Analysis
item.description: For this example project, I created an interactive Dashboard that tracks a hotel’s revenue throughout the years. This Analysis answers the following questions: Is our hotel revenue growing by year? Should we increase our parking lot size? What trends can we see in the data? Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 3: UI Automation
item.description: Developed a hybrid test framework using Selenium and Java for browser automation Increased Java End-To-End test code coverage to 80% Performed Regression testing after releasing new features Created automated script for REST API testing using Rest Assured framework. Tracked and reported bugs using Jira Link to Github Repository
